title: Pallone, Tonko Praise the Biden EPA’s PFAS Roadmap
summary: Chairmen Pallone and Tonko applaud the Biden Administration's roadmap to tackle PFAS contamination.

title: Pallone Opening Remarks at Legislative Hearing on Strengthening American Manufacturing and Competitiveness
summary: Chairman Pallone's opening remarks at a legislative hearing on strengthening American manufacturing and competitiveness.

title: E&C Leaders Announce Legislation to Reform Section 230
summary: E&C leaders unveil new legislation to reform Section 230. The bill would lift the Section 230 liability shield when an online platform knowingly or recklessly uses an algorithm to recommend content that materially contributes to physical or severe emotional injury.

title: E&C Announces Energy Hearing on Offshore Wind
summary: Chairman Pallone and Energy Subcommittee Chairman Bobby L. Rush announce a hearing on offshore wind.

title: E&C Health Subcommittee Announces Hearing on Public Health Legislation
summary: Pallone and Eshoo announced a Health Subcommittee legislative hearing.

title: Pallone Responds to FDA’s First-Ever Marketing Authorization of E-Cigarette Products
summary: Pallone's statement on FDA issuing its first-ever marketing approval of an e-cigarette product.
